anya-e0105n35:1_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāpi ca ācariyabuddhaghosatthereneva katāti vadanti, kāraṇaṁ panettha na dissati.
anya-e0105n35:1_1: Sā pana atthadassittherena ca buddhamittattherena ca mahisāsakanikāyikena ca buddhadevattherenāti tīhi therehi abhiyācito mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ vācanāmaggaṁ nissāya katā. Imissāpi nāmaviseso natthi. Vuttaṁ himissā ārambhe –
anya-e0105n35:11_0: Bhāsissaṁ bhāsato taṁ me, sādhu gaṇhantu sādhavo’’ti.
anya-e0105n35:12_0: Ettāvatā ca ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa ganthabhāvena pākaṭāhi sabbaṭṭhakathāhi saha visuddhimaggassa karaṇappakāro vitthārena vibhāvito hoti.
